content:
Q: Can I get a refund when I cancel my policy?
A: Either you or HL Assurance can cancel the policy by giving the other party 14 daysâ€™ notice in writing. If you cancel the policy, you will receive a short period refund of premium paid for the unexpired period of the maid insurance. The amount refund is dependable by the period of when you cancel the policy.
questions: What is the notice period required to cancel the policy?
Will I receive a refund if I cancel my maid insurance policy?
How is the refund amount calculated when I cancel my policy?
Can HL Assurance cancel my policy without my consent?
What happens if I cancel my policy after the 14-day notice period?
Is there a specific format for the written notice to cancel the policy?
What does 'short period refund' mean in the context of policy cancellation?
Are there any fees associated with canceling my maid insurance policy?
How long does it take to process a refund after canceling the policy?
Can I cancel my policy verbally, or does it have to be in writing?
